title: Motorcycle V2 Chopper Big Sound Effects Pack
description: Big Motorcycle V2 Chopper Sound Effects Pack
longDescription:
A package of 107 motorcycle sound effects, recorded with premium quality equipment.


This pack includes looped onboard recordings, cruising sounds, pass-bys and foleys.

All of the sounds were divided into different speeds, rpm values, microphones used and thier placement.


Recorded with Sennheiser MKH 418-S, Schoeps MK4, Electro-Voice RE320, Shure SM57, Sennheiser MKE-2 into Sound Devices MixPre-6 II.


Audio demo: https://bit.ly/3Ti0Urh
technicalDetails:
• 107 sound effects / cues

• 24 bit, 96 kHz wav, stereo and mono files

• 11 foley sounds

• 42 loops

• 12 pass-bys

• 24 onboard recordings

• 5 additional sounds (exhaust shots)

• can be used both in games and promo videos, trailers, cutscenes

• total time of all recordings - 1h 21m 27s


Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: YES

Mac: YES

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1oh1GnwGmMAap_Ga-ntP4aYApn1ONlwOe/view?usp=sharing
